question: What is Clipwise AI?
answer: Clipwise AI is a Chrome extension that converts any webpage into clean, AI-ready Markdown with one click. It removes ads, navigation, and clutter so you can paste webpage content directly into ChatGPT, Claude, or any AI assistant.

question: Is Clipwise AI free to use?
answer: Yes! Clipwise AI offers a free tier with {freeDailyLimit} conversions per day. For unlimited conversions, you can upgrade to Premium for a one-time payment of {premiumPrice}. No subscription required.

question: Is my data private? Does Clipwise AI send my data to servers?
answer: Your privacy is protected. All webpage processing happens locally in your browser. We cannot see, access, or store any content you convert. The extension works completely offline.

question: Which browsers are supported?
answer: Clipwise AI works on any Chromium-based browser including Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge, Brave, and Opera.

question: Which AI tools does Clipwise AI work with?
answer: Clipwise AI works with any AI tool that accepts text input, including ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, Perplexity, and AI coding assistants like Cursor and GitHub Copilot.
